modName: Spooky Edits - Darker Stalhrim Armor and Weapons
summary: An attempt to make one of my most disliked armor sets a bit less gaudy :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] An attempt to make one of my most disliked armor sets a bit less gaudy whilst trying to keep the set slightly lore friendly :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Meshes :[/b][/color] The vanilla weapons, armor and shield all used different reflection maps and had huge differences in environment map scale so in an attempt to unify everything I edited every mesh to use one environment map and have the same map scale.. So I guess unfortunately this mod will overwrite any other mod that edits these models. Since I used the refmap from the weapons for everything, deleting / overwriting any of the weapon meshes won't effect their look significantly, but I increased the env map scale on those so they will have less reflectivity if you do.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Quiver Mesh :[/b][/color] I am a big fan ofÂ [b]EvilDeadAsh[/b]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5711/?]Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows[/url] mod but I'm a bit shy sometimes about asking permission so I decided to just edit the quiver scale and position to come up with my own version.. I almost left the quiver mesh out completely (and adjusted its envmap to try and compensate) but I also had to fix an annoying bug on the arrows some vanilla meshes have where the alpha flag is set to 4845 instead of 4844; when I'm using an enb meshes with that flag look transparent and blurry, especially against the sky.. I assume it's to do with depth of field but I haven't really investigated it beyond knowing changing that number works :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] You can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] [/b]I use an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url], alongside hundreds of other mods :P
